summary: The Department of Homeland Security has a multi-year plan to address its long-standing financial management issues. This includes acquiring modern financial management systems for its component agencies. This Q&A report provides an update to our Feb. 2023 evaluation of DHS's systems modernization efforts. title: Financial Management Systems: DHS Should Improve Plans for Addressing Its High-Risk Area and Guidance for Independent Reviews
